NK041(di)015:1: // rab tu gnas par byed pa'i cho ga'i lag len
NK041(di)015:2: gsal bar byed pa legs par bshad pa'i rol mtsho
NK041(di)015:5: zhi khro rigs brgya'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo kun //
NK041(di)015:6: spro dang bsdu ba'i byed por chu zla bzhin //
NK041(di)015:7: dngos kun khyab bdag rdo rje sems dpa' dang //
NK041(di)015:8: dbyer med ro mnyam drin can bla mar 'dud //
NK041(di)015:9: gang gi gsung ngag legs bshad bdud rtsi'i dpyid //
NK041(di)015:10: dngos grub rin chen 'byung gnas rol pa'i mtshor //
NK041(di)015:11: yongs bskyil rang dang skal mnyam thos pa yis //
NK041(di)015:12: dub pa de dag ngal gso'i skyes su sbyin //
NK041(di)015:13: de yang 'di ltar nges pa bya ba yin te sngon du shes dbye bshad pa /
NK041(di)015:14: bshad 'bras kyi cho ga lag tu blang ba /
NK041(di)015:15: zhar byung yan lag gzhan spros pa'i tshul lo //
NK041(di)015:19: de la rab gnas ma byas pa'i nyes pa /
NK041(di)015:23: gang gi tshe bya ba'i dus dang bdun /
NK041(di)015:25: gzung 'dzin gnyis bsdus kyi chos rnams thams cad gzod
NK041(di)015:26: ma nyid nas 'od gsal ba'i ngo bor son pas
NK041(di)015:27: gzhan gyis 'dus ma byas pa'i ye shes sems dpa'
NK041(di)015:28: til la mar bzhin khyab par gnas pa ni lhun
NK041(di)015:29: gyis grub pa'i rab gnas te /
NK041(di)015:31: 'di nyid ye shes chen po ste //
NK041(di)015:32: thams cad lus la rtag tu gnas //
NK041(di)015:33: dngos dang dngos med bdag nyid gtso //
NK041(di)015:34: gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul //
NK041(di)015:35: brtan dang g.yo bar khyab nas gnas //
NK041(di)015:37: de ltar gnas pa'i ye shes de mngon du ma
NK041(di)015:38: gyur pa rnams la kun rdzob kyi bden par brten
NK041(di)015:39: nas dam tshig pa bskyed cing de la ye shes
NK041(di)015:40: sems dpa' dgug gzhug bcing mnyes dbang bskur ba'i sbyor
NK041(di)015:41: ba sogs kyis lha'i ngo bor sgrub pa 'di ni
NK041(di)015:42: / 'gro ba rnams bsod nams kyi dngos po nye
NK041(di)015:43: bar bsgrubs te nges pa'i don zab mo la dkri
NK041(di)015:44: ba'i don can du shes par bya ste /
NK041(di)015:45: de ltar yang rab gnas rgyud du /
NK041(di)015:46: sangs rgyas kun na rab tu bzhugs //
NK041(di)015:47: rab tu gnas pa gang yang med //
NK041(di)015:49: 'jig rten kun rdzob la brten nas //
NK041(di)015:50: rab tu gnas pa rab tu btags //
NK041(di)015:52: nges pa'i don gyis gsungs pa'i tshul lo //
NK041(di)015:57: 'bur du byas pa la sogs pa zhes gsungs pa'i sku gzugs kyis mtshon nas /
NK041(di)015:64: tshal la sogs pa rnams so //
NK041(di)015:66: sku gzugs mtshan nyid ldan pa ste //
NK041(di)015:67: zhi ba la sogs ro dang ldan //
NK041(di)015:68: tshad kyis tshad la phab cing bzang //
NK041(di)015:69: de 'dra rab tu gnas par bya //
NK041(di)015:71: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i sku gzugs kyi
NK041(di)015:72: snang brnyan so so'i mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid
NK041(di)015:73: dang ldan pa / ro zhes pa nyams te zhi
NK041(di)015:74: ba la sogs pa'i nyams dang 'gyur bag chags pa
NK041(di)015:75: mdo dang rgyud sde'i chag tshad la phebs pas bzang
NK041(di)015:76: zhing mdzes pa kun gyi yi gar 'ong ba des
NK041(di)015:77: mtshon nas mchod rten sogs rab tu gnas byar gyur
NK041(di)015:78: pa thams cad so so'i bshad tshod las 'byung ba'i
NK041(di)015:79: tshad dang mtshan nyid thams cad tshang zhing phun sum
NK041(di)015:80: dang ldan pa / tshogs par bya'o // sku gzugs
NK041(di)015:81: sogs kyi nang du bzhugs pa'i ring bsrel bzhi ni
NK041(di)015:82: dang ldan pa / tshogs par bya'o // / gzungs sngags rnams chos sku'i ring bsrel /
NK041(di)015:83: gdung rus sogs sku gdung gi ring bsrel /
NK041(di)015:84: dbu lo sen mo sogs sku bal gyi ring bsrel /
NK041(di)015:85: sha r+ai ram sogs yungs 'bru lta bu'i ring bsrel lo //
NK041(di)015:87: gtsug tor dang dbu'i nang du yungs 'bru lta bu'i
NK041(di)015:88: ring bsrel sogs byin rten dang bla brgyud kyi mtshan
NK041(di)015:89: sngags dang sku gzugs ush+ni sha'i gtsug tor rnam rgyal
NK041(di)015:91: gzungs rnams gzhug bya rgyud yin kyang 'dir 'jug pa dmigs bsal lo //
NK041(di)015:92: mgul du rten 'brel snying po dang dbyangs gsal sogs byin rlabs kyi tshogs /
NK041(di)015:93: sku'i stod zom la rnal 'byor chen po sde gsum gyi gzungs rnams dang /
NK041(di)015:94: de dag gi sku gzungs bzhi rnams /
NK041(di)015:95: thugs kar rig pa phug ron khyad par lha gang yin gyi rtsa sngags /
NK041(di)015:99: lte bar bya rgyud kyi gzungs rnams dang de dag gi sku rten dang /
NK041(di)015:100: smad du sangs rgyas rabs bdun gyi gso sbyong sogs
NK041(di)015:101: mdo sde'i gzungs rnams gzhug cing gzhan yang gnas yig
NK041(di)015:102: dang skye mched byin rlabs rnams so so'i gzhung bzhin
NK041(di)015:103: dgod / ma khengs na sku'i stod smad thams cad
NK041(di)015:104: du sngar gyi rim pa bzhin ma nor bar mdo
NK041(di)015:105: rgyud kyi glegs bam sogs gzhug /
NK041(di)015:106: pad gdan la chos skyong nor lha'i sngags dang srog
NK041(di)015:107: 'khor bla rdo khyad par tshul bzhin bsgrubs pa'i gnod
NK041(di)015:108: sbyin 'khor lo rin chen 'bru sman dar zab dri
NK041(di)015:109: bzang sogs yo byad ji snyed pa dang bcas gzhug
NK041(di)015:110: / rig gzungs 'khrugs pa sogs kyi nyes pa zhi phyir /
NK041(di)015:111: pa phug ron dang rten 'brel snying po ni stod
NK041(di)015:112: smad thams cad du gzhug cing 'bul ba'i tshe ngag
NK041(di)015:113: tu'ang bazla'o // mchod rten gyi tshe gtsug tor dang dbu'i rnams 'khor lo dang bre yan /
NK041(di)015:114: sku ngo bo'i rnams bum pa nas bang rim 'og ma yan dang /
NK041(di)015:115: pad+ma'i rnams gdan khrir gzhug cing /
NK041(di)015:116: bris sku rnams la ji ltar rigs pa rgyab tu bri'o //
NK041(di)015:117: srog shing med pa dang go rim 'khrugs pa sogs
NK041(di)015:118: la rnam smin mi bzad pa bskyed par gsungs pas
NK041(di)015:119: dpyod pa dang ldan pa rnams kyis sgrim po'i blos
NK041(di)015:120: rtogs par bya'o // gsum pa ni /
NK041(di)015:121: rab gnas ma byas pa'i lha ni ro dang 'dra bas mchod par mi 'os /
NK041(di)015:122: mchod kyang bsod nams kyi 'bras bu mi 'byin zhing
NK041(di)015:123: gang du bzhag pa'i phyogs der yang bkra mi shis
NK041(di)015:124: pa skyed par gsungs shing sngon gyi gtam rgyud las
NK041(di)015:127: gang du sku gzugs rab rdzogs pa //
NK041(di)015:128: byin ma brlabs par ring gnas na //
NK041(di)015:129: de la bkra mi shis pa 'byung //
NK041(di)015:130: de srid mchod par de mi 'os //
NK041(di)015:132: cho ga yang rgyud dang rtog pa las gsungs pa
NK041(di)015:133: ma gtogs dman pa'i cho gas kyang nyes pa bskyed
NK041(di)015:134: de / cho ga dman pas mi bya ste //
NK041(di)015:135: rab gnas rtag par bkra mi shis //
NK041(di)015:140: spyir smos pa'i skyon bzlog pa de yang phan yon yin cing /
NK041(di)015:141: khyad par cho ga mtshan nyid dang ldan pas rab gnas byas pa dang /
NK041(di)015:142: byas pa'i rten de la mchod cing bkur sti bgyis
NK041(di)015:143: pa'i bsod nams rgyal ba sras dang bcas pas rtag
NK041(di)015:144: tu bsrung zhing byin gyis rlobs /
NK041(di)015:145: tshe 'dir phun sum tshogs pa'i dpal thams cad thob
NK041(di)015:146: cing phyi ma bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi
NK041(di)015:147: bde ba mchog la reg par gdon mi za ste
NK041(di)015:148: / de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis //
NK041(di)015:149: dngos grub 'dod pas nan tan bya //
NK041(di)015:150: cho ga bdag nyid nus pa yis //
NK041(di)015:151: brtags pa las byung tshul legs pas //
NK041(di)015:152: de byas bsod nams che ba ni //
NK041(di)015:153: mthong dang ma mthong rnams su skye //
NK041(di)015:154: sku gzugs sngags kyi mtshan nyid kyis //
NK041(di)015:155: de la byin rlabs byed par 'gyur //
NK041(di)015:158: theg pa gsum gyi bslab pa mtha' dag dang khyad
NK041(di)015:159: par rdo rje theg pa'i dkyil 'khor chen por yongs
NK041(di)015:160: su smin cing thun mong dang thun mong ma yin
NK041(di)015:161: pa'i dam tshig la gnas pas /
NK041(di)015:162: stong nyid snying rje zung du 'jug pa'i ye shes
NK041(di)015:163: mchog gi nges pas rgyud bltams shing de nyid bcu
NK041(di)015:164: sogs slob dpon gyi las rab 'byams la dbang 'byor
NK041(di)015:165: pa mthong brgyud kyi sgo nas rab gnas kyi cho
NK041(di)015:166: ga la mkhas shing byung chub pa ste /
NK041(di)015:167: slob dpon de nyid bcu shes shing //
NK041(di)015:168: mtshan nyid kun dang yang dag ldan //
NK041(di)015:169: phyag rgya sngags dang cho ga shes //
NK041(di)015:170: las rnams kun la mkhas pa'o //
NK041(di)015:174: stangs stabs gdan dang bzlas brjod dang //
NK041(di)015:175: sbyin sreg mchod pa las la sbyar //
NK041(di)015:176: slar bsdu ba dang rnam pa bcu //
NK041(di)015:178: srung ba dbang bskur gtor bzlas dgar //
NK041(di)015:179: phyir bzlog dkyil 'khor sgrub sdigs gshegs //
NK041(di)015:181: srung ba ni bka'i 'khor los so //
NK041(di)015:182: dbang ni gnyis pa dang gsum pa'o //
NK041(di)015:183: gtor ma ni sha lnga sogs nang gi'o //
NK041(di)015:184: dgar ba ni drag las kyis chos dbyings su bsgral ba'o //
NK041(di)015:185: phyir bzlog ni zlog pa dang bris pa'i zlog pa ste so sor rtsi'o //
NK041(di)015:186: sgrub pa ni ye shes sems dpa' mngal 'byin sogs thun mong ma yin pa'o //
NK041(di)015:187: sdigs pa ni ma grub na spogs pa'i cho gas gnad la dbab pa'o //
NK041(di)015:189: snying ga'i zla ba rdo rje la bsdu ba lta
NK041(di)015:190: bu mtshon pa ste mi 'dra ba'i bshad pa gzhan
NK041(di)015:191: 'byung ba de dag tu shes par bya'o //
NK041(di)015:192: chos de dag dang ldan pa'i slob dpon yang dge slong rab /
NK041(di)015:196: de nyid bcu ni yongs shes pa //
NK041(di)015:197: gsum las dge slong mchog yin 'bring //
NK041(di)015:198: dge tshul zhes bya de nyid las //
NK041(di)015:199: khyim na gnas pa tha ma'o //
NK041(di)015:201: sa thob ma gtogs pa'i khyim pa'i rtags can yod bzhin du rab gnas kyi slob dpon dang /
NK041(di)015:202: rgyal po'i bla ma byas na bstan pa la mi rung bar gsungs so //
NK041(di)015:204: spyir sa'i phyogs rnams mdangs snum zhing khod snyoms pa
NK041(di)015:205: ljon shing dang mtsho rdzing me tog gi tshal sogs
NK041(di)015:206: kyis rnam par brgyan pas bkra shis shing /
NK041(di)015:207: zhi rgyas kyi las la mngon par basngagasa pa yid dang rjes su mthun pa'i gnas su bya zhing /
NK041(di)015:208: khyad par rten chen po spyan drang du mi rung
NK041(di)015:209: ba yin na de'i dbang ldan gyi phyogs sam gang
NK041(di)015:212: yang thog mchod rten la sogs dang //
NK041(di)015:213: khyim dang lha yi gnas rnams su //
NK041(di)015:214: sangs rgyas la sogs rab gnas ni //
NK041(di)015:215: cho ga dbang dang ldan par bya //
NK041(di)015:218: bkra shis dag pa chen po'i gnas //
NK041(di)015:219: yid 'ong nyams ni rnam par dga' //
NK041(di)015:222: nges pa'i dus zla ba drug /
NK041(di)015:225: tshes grangs bdun zhes pa la /
NK041(di)015:227: mgo 1mchu 2dbo 3sa ga 4chu 5stod nag 6pa'i zla ba rnams so //
NK041(di)015:228: gza' phur bu 1lhag pa 2pa wa 3sangs zla 4ba rnams so //
NK041(di)015:229: rgyu skar rgyal 1me 2bzhi lha mtshams 3dbo 4snar 5ma byi bzhin 6mgo 7 lag8 /
NK041(di)015:230: s+n+ron 9snubs 10chu stod 11chu smad 12khrums stod 13khrums smad 14rnams so //
NK041(di)015:231: tshes grangs gnyis gsum lnga bdun brgyad bcu gsum bco lnga rnams so //
NK041(di)015:233: dkyil 'khor dang ni rab gnas pa //
NK041(di)015:234: yar gyi ngo la brtag par bya //
NK041(di)015:236: 'on te nyi shu dgu dang stong spangs pa'i mar
NK041(di)015:237: ngo la yang gza' skar 'phrod sbyor dge na byar
NK041(di)015:238: rung ste / gza' dang skar ma 'dzom gyur na //
NK041(di)015:239: mar gyi ngo la'ang nyes pa med //
NK041(di)015:241: dus nges pa de dag la 'chi sbyor sreg tshes
NK041(di)015:242: bish+ti rnams spangs pa'i gza' skar 'phrod sbyor yud tsam
NK041(di)015:243: bzang po dag legs par brtags nas bya'o //
NK041(di)015:245: dus thams cad du rab gnas bya rung bar gsungs
NK041(di)015:246: pa ni slob dpon mi mthun phyogs zil gyis gnon
NK041(di)015:247: nus pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa la dgongs
NK041(di)015:248: pa yin no // gnyis pa bshad 'bras lag tu blang ba la bsnyen pa dang /
NK041(di)015:251: gtsug lag khang sogs rab tu gnas pa kho na'i
NK041(di)015:252: ched dam rang dang gzhan gyi don bla na med
NK041(di)015:253: pa'i dngos grub don du gnyer ba'i slob mas gsol
NK041(di)015:254: ba btab pa'am / don de dag rang gi yid la brnag pas kyang rung ste /
NK041(di)015:255: yid dang mthun pa'i gnas su zab mo'i rnal 'byor
NK041(di)015:256: las mi g.yo bas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bsnyen
NK041(di)015:257: pa so so'i sgrub thabs bzhin kha skong gi sbyin
NK041(di)015:258: sreg dang bcas pa mthar phyin pa'o //
NK041(di)015:260: rab gnas gang bya ba de'i sngon du bsnyen pa kha gso ba ste /
NK041(di)015:262: lan gsum gzhan gyis gsol btab pas //
NK041(di)015:264: bsnyen pa rnam gnyis mthar phyin pas //
NK041(di)015:266: gnyis pa cho ga dngos ni rgyas pa'i rim pa dang sbyar ba las /
NK041(di)015:271: sa chog sta gon bri zhing bsham //
NK041(di)015:272: sgrub mchod bum bzlas sbyang bkru phyi //
NK041(di)015:273: bskyed drangs bgegs bskrad mchod dgug gzhug /
NK041(di)015:274: rgyas btab dbang bskur mchod bstod sngags //
NK041(di)015:275: gtor ma snyan gsan mchod cing bstod //
NK041(di)015:276: bzod gshegs rten dgab bdag nyid bsrung //
NK041(di)015:279: brtag slong sbyang bzung bsrung ba rgyas pa'i tshe gar
NK041(di)015:280: rtsa 'chams kyang cho ga gang yin dang bstun nas
NK041(di)015:283: sa lha dkyil 'khor pa bum pa'i lhag gnas gsum mam slob ma yod na de nyid dang /
NK041(di)015:284: gzhung gang brten gyi sta gon 'dir sbrel kyang /
NK041(di)015:286: dkyil 'khor bris sgrub sta gon bya //
NK041(di)015:288: bla ma'i phyag len mthun par 'byung ba bzhin no //
NK041(di)015:289: gsum pa dkyil 'khor bri zhing rdzas bsham pa ni /
NK041(di)015:290: sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'du bya rgyas pa'i tshe phyi
NK041(di)015:291: nang gi mtshams gcod ma tam bsgral ba sogs kyang
NK041(di)015:292: byed / ba dang bum pa 'god pa sogs gzhung bzhin las khyad par gyi yo byad ni /
NK041(di)015:294: rdzas rnams thams cad tshogs byas nas //
NK041(di)015:295: lho yi phyogs su stegs bu brtsig /
NK041(di)015:296: ba yi rnam lngas byugs nas kyang //
NK041(di)015:297: bum pa la sogs bkram par bya //
NK041(di)015:299: ba byung dang tsan+dana la sogs pa'i chus byugs shing
NK041(di)015:300: bla re dang ba dan rgyal mtshan rnams kyis mdzes
NK041(di)015:302: gnas bya'i rten rnams gos gsar pa dmar ser gyis g.yogs pa bkod de /
NK041(di)015:303: gos dmar can dag mthong gyur na //
NK041(di)015:306: rten gyi mdun ngos dang dkyil 'khor sgrub pa'i gyi shar ram lho'i phyogs su khrus stegs dang /
NK041(di)015:307: bum stan dang thun mong du /
NK041(di)015:308: ngos rer khru bzhi dpangs su khru gang gru bzhir
NK041(di)015:309: brtsigs pa'am tshad de dang mnyam pa thig gis bcad
NK041(di)015:310: pa'i gzhir bdud rtsi lnga dang ba byung gis byug
NK041(di)015:312: gru bzhi pa gcig gis bskor ba'i sna gru chad ser po /
NK041(di)015:313: tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte ba phyogs mtshams
NK041(di)015:314: su rigs lnga gzhan du bkra shis rdzas brgyad bri
NK041(di)015:315: bar bzhed kyang gal por gsungs pa bzhin 'adi'o //
NK041(di)015:317: lha mi bskyed na mtshan ma mi dgos /
NK041(di)015:318: de'i dbus su pad+ma 'dab ma bris pa'i shing stan sogs kyi khar khrus gzhong bzhag /
NK041(di)015:319: 'dab ma brgyad la chas su bcug pa'i khrus bum
NK041(di)015:320: dri'i shing tsha spang spos b+aa la ka tsan+dana rnams
NK041(di)015:321: zho gnyis re thum byas pa chu bre brgyad la
NK041(di)015:322: bcug nas bzhi gsum ma 'brid bar bskol ba'i lhag
NK041(di)015:323: ma yin no // chus sum gnyis bkang ba brgyad kyi mdun nas g.yas bskor /
NK041(di)015:324: dang por ga bur gur gum tsan dan dkar dmar gla rtsi'am dz+aa ti ste dri sna tshogs /
NK041(di)015:325: gnyis par ka ra sbrang rtsi bu ram ste mngar /
NK041(di)015:327: bzhi par star ka sogs 'bras bu /
NK041(di)015:328: lnga par nas 'bras gro sran ma til sogs 'bru /
NK041(di)015:334: sha ta pa r+aa dzi shu dag dkar po /
NK041(di)015:335: to dan+da t+ao la ut+pala sngon po /
NK041(di)015:336: ha sa de wa cog mgo sman ni dbang /
NK041(di)015:338: brgyad par gser dngul mu tig byu ru mu men sogs rin po che sna tshogs blug /
NK041(di)015:339: de rnams kyi mdun du rim pa bzhin dang por
NK041(di)015:340: nya gro d+ha u dum+ba ra blak+sha pispa l+ya gan+d+he
NK041(di)015:341: ma nu ste shing mkhar snod du /
NK041(di)015:343: bod du rnyed dka' bas rung mthun bal bu 'om
NK041(di)015:344: bu kham bu lcang skya shug pa thang shing sogs
NK041(di)015:347: bdud rtsi lnga ste 'dir 'o ma zho mar sbrang rtsi ka ra rnams so //
NK041(di)015:348: gsum par ba byung lnga ni /
NK041(di)015:350: dmar ser ba yi 'o ma dang //
NK041(di)015:351: ba yi zho dang ba yi mar //
NK041(di)015:352: ba gcin ba yi lci ba dang /
NK041(di)015:354: ba dmar ser zas gtsang mas gsos pa'i 'o ma zho mar lci ba chu dang lnga'o //
NK041(di)015:360: drug par skyu ru'i phye mkhar snod /
NK041(di)015:362: bdun par yung ba'i phye mkhar snod /
NK041(di)015:365: bzang rnams zangs dang mkhar ba sogs kyi snod so sor blug pa'o //
NK041(di)015:366: ma 'byor na sug pa nye shing ma sha sran dkar /
NK041(di)015:367: rnams kyi phye ma snod gcig tu bkod pa bzhag /
NK041(di)015:368: de bzhin du rin po che'i snod /
NK041(di)015:369: bku nye'i 'bru til lam yungs kar gyi /
NK041(di)015:370: mar dri zhim pos bgos pa dang /
NK041(di)015:371: de dag byug pa'i d+aur sngon gyi pir dang bcas pa /
NK041(di)015:372: de rnams kyi steng nas gdugs dkar pos dbub cing mtha' mchod pas bskor /
NK041(di)015:373: gzhan yang me long dang kha tshar ma nyams pa'i
NK041(di)015:374: khrus ras dkar po dri bzang gis rigs lnga'i sa
NK041(di)015:377: sbyong chas kyi gtor ma ting lo gu gul yungs
NK041(di)015:378: chu kham phor dur lci zan changs seng ras rnams
NK041(di)015:379: dang til la sogs pa yang ji ltar bde bar
NK041(di)015:380: bkod / ngos gcig tu mnga' dbul gyi man+dala thig
NK041(di)015:381: chen brgyad btab pa'i dbus nas phyogs rer cha mnyam
NK041(di)015:382: lnga lnga byas pa'i zur na zlum skor nyis rim
NK041(di)015:383: dang lte ba'i cha gnyis zlum por bskor ba la
NK041(di)015:384: bkod / / dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa /
NK041(di)015:385: de'i phyi'i cha bzhi ri rab kyi bang riim ste
NK041(di)015:386: shar dkar lho sngo nub dmar byang ser ba'i zur
NK041(di)015:387: gyi grwa mig rnams nag po /
NK041(di)015:388: khyams gzhi sngon po chu ris can gyi shar du lus 'phags gling zla gam dkar po /
NK041(di)015:389: lhor 'dzam gling sog kha sngon po /
NK041(di)015:390: nub tu ba glang spyod zlum po dmar po /
NK041(di)015:391: byang du sgra mi snyan gru bzhi ser po /
NK041(di)015:392: re re yang rang 'dra'i gling phran gnyis gnyis kyis
NK041(di)015:393: brten pa'i shar nub kyi gling dang ri rab kyi
NK041(di)015:394: bar zla ba dang nyi ma /
NK041(di)015:395: gling che chung gi mtshams brgyad du shar stod nas rim bzhin dpal be'u dang 'khor lo /
NK041(di)015:401: dung dang gser byang du nya rnams so //
NK041(di)015:402: phyi'i zlum skor ni lcags ri ste nag por bya'o //
NK041(di)015:403: dbus dang phyogs bzhir me tog gi tshom bu bkod cing mtha' mchod pas bskor /
NK041(di)015:404: de dang nye bar rin po che'i snod me tog
NK041(di)015:405: dkar pos bkang ba'i dbus su gzungs chu'i bum pa'i
NK041(di)015:406: khar me long la tsan+dana dkar po /
NK041(di)015:408: gi wang gsum gyis rten 'brel snying po tshar bdun bris pa dang /
NK041(di)015:409: yig mgo phyir bstan 'khor stabs su /
NK041(di)015:410: bza' bca' ji snyed pas bskor ba'i ts+aa ru'i rgyan gyis brgyan /
NK041(di)015:412: gzhan yang phyi nang gi mchod tshogs bzang zhing rgya che ba dang /
NK041(di)015:413: spyi dang bye brag gi mnga' dbul gyi yo byad /
NK041(di)015:414: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtor ma /
NK041(di)015:415: rol mo'i khyad par sogs 'dir dgos pa'i yo byad thams cad tshogs par bshams nas /
NK041(di)015:416: mdzes pa'i gos rgyan dang ldan pas 'dug par bya'o //
NK041(di)015:417: bzhi pa dkyil 'khor sgrub mchod ni /
NK041(di)015:418: bdag mdun dbang len pa rnams so so'i nges pa bzhin no //
NK041(di)015:420: lha bum gong du bsgrubs zin nas /
NK041(di)015:421: 'dir khrus bum rnams las sngags kyis bsang /
NK041(di)015:423: stong pa'i ngang las sogs nas nus ldan du gyur gyi bar ro //
NK041(di)015:424: bzlas pa'i tshe slob dpon gyi gzungs thag la 'ju zhing /
NK041(di)015:426: me long ngos la tsan+dana chus //
NK041(di)015:427: rten 'brel yi ge bris nas ni //
NK041(di)015:428: brgya brgya bzlas te bum par blug /
NK041(di)015:429: ces pa'i don ni gzungs bum gyi me long khar
NK041(di)015:430: rdo rje bzhag pa'i srad bu nas gzungs bum gyi
NK041(di)015:431: steng du zla ba la gnas pa'i sogs nas /
NK041(di)015:432: dz+ai na dzika sogs rigs lnga'i snying po rnams phyogs dang mtshungs par bzla bar bshad /
NK041(di)015:433: ro gcig tu 'dres par bsam zhing rten 'brel snying po bzla ba'i bar ro //
NK041(di)015:434: gzhan yang yungs kar dang gu gul sogs las sngags
NK041(di)015:435: dang h+aum bzhi pas basngagasa pa ni phyag len no
NK041(di)015:437: bgegs mi shis pa sdig pa sbyang ba gsum gyi dang po la /
NK041(di)015:438: zhi ba phyed ma drag pos sbyong ba gsum las /
NK041(di)015:441: rdzas dang sngags gnyis rten la g.yas bskor gsum /
NK041(di)015:444: ting lo dang rten la g.yon bskor /
NK041(di)015:446: sum rdo rje gsor dril bu gsil /
NK041(di)015:447: b+ha'i sngags ni drag po ste phyed ma'o //
NK041(di)015:449: rang nyid h+aum mdzad du bskyed nas khro bo spyan
NK041(di)015:450: 'dren mchod bstod bka' bsgo spos rol thun brab pa
NK041(di)015:451: sogs rdzas sngags ting nge 'dzin thams cad drag po'o
NK041(di)015:452: // tshul 'di la lag len gyi rgyun las gzhung
NK041(di)015:453: gi khungs med ces snga rabs pa kha cig gsungs
NK041(di)015:455: gsang ba thams cad gcod pa'i rgyud du /
NK041(di)015:456: bgegs rnams tshim byas rngan zhing gzir //
NK041(di)015:457: shin tu gzir zhing bsdigs te bskrad //
NK041(di)015:460: de dang mtshungs par bshad pa'i phyir ro //
NK041(di)015:461: gnyis pa mi shis pa sbyang ba ni /
NK041(di)015:462: nir many+tsa zhes pa byur bsal ba ste /
NK041(di)015:464: sarba p+aa pam da ha na badz+ra ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)015:465: zhes pa'i sngags kyis yungs kar la basngagasa te /
NK041(di)015:466: sku la bskor zhing mer bsreg /
NK041(di)015:470: lan mang du ni byur bsal ba //
NK041(di)015:471: rab gnas la ni yongs su basngagasa //
NK041(di)015:472: zhes pa'i rim pa ni sarba p+aa pam sogs kyis
NK041(di)015:473: yungs chu g.yon g.yas su so sor gnyis bskor zhing
NK041(di)015:474: mer dor / kham phor sogs h+aum dang las sngags
NK041(di)015:475: kyis sngar bzhin bskor nas bzed zhal du dor ba
NK041(di)015:477: gsum pa sdig pa sbyang ba ni /
NK041(di)015:479: pam gyur sdig pa mi bzad pa //
NK041(di)015:480: sna yi sgo nas phyungs nas ni //
NK041(di)015:481: de nas mkha' 'gro'i gzugs bsgoms la //
NK041(di)015:482: kun tu zos par bsgom par bya //
NK041(di)015:484: kha cig g.yas g.yon du me chu 'god par bshad khungs med gsungs kyang /
NK041(di)015:486: g.yas g.yon du ni yongs bskor nas //
NK041(di)015:487: me dang chu la blugs par bya //
NK041(di)015:489: mkha' 'gro snying thig tu'ang bshad pa mthun par 'byung ngo //
NK041(di)015:490: des na bdag dang sbyin pa'i bdag po sogs nas khro bo bsdu zhing me thal ba de /
NK041(di)015:492: bdun pa bkru zhing phyi ba ni /
NK041(di)015:494: slob ma'i tshogs dang bcas pa yis //
NK041(di)015:495: sngags kyi gtsang sbras bkru bar bya //
NK041(di)015:497: sbyang gzhi bzo bo la sogs pa'i mi gtsang bas
NK041(di)015:498: sbags pa'i dri ma sbyong byed ye shes kyi bdud
NK041(di)015:500: sbyong ba po rdo rje slob dpon rjes su sbyong ba dang bcas pa /
NK041(di)015:501: sbyangs 'bras rten ye shes sems dpa'i ngo bor bsgrub rung du 'gyur pa'o //
NK041(di)015:502: ji ltar sbyong ba'i tshul ni /
NK041(di)015:504: lugs ma rnams ni dngos su bkru //
NK041(di)015:505: ri mo rnams ni me long la'o //
NK041(di)015:506: zhes pas rten spyan drang du rung ba rnams khrus stegs khar spyan 'dren /
NK041(di)015:507: mi rung ba rnams de'i gzugs brnyan shar ba'i me long khrus gzhong gi khar bzung la /
NK041(di)015:508: khrus dkyil gyi rtsar slob dpon rgyal thebs lag g.yas
NK041(di)015:509: su khrus bum dang po thogs pa'i phrag g.yas par
NK041(di)015:510: khrus ras dpyangs / de'i g.yon du til mar dang me long 'dzin pa dang /
NK041(di)015:511: g.yas su dag byed dang khrus bum gnyis pa bzung
NK041(di)015:512: ba'i phrag g.yas par gos zung bkal ba rnams 'khod
NK041(di)015:513: pas / gang 'dir bcom ldan 'das sogs snyan mnan
NK041(di)015:514: pa'i rjes su d+aurba'i pir gyis til mar dri ldan
NK041(di)015:515: me long la khyab par byugs nas sarba sogs brjod
NK041(di)015:516: pas drud cing mnye zhing pir des shing shun lnga'i
NK041(di)015:517: phye ma byugs nas sarba sogs brjod pas drud cing
NK041(di)015:518: mnyed la khrus bum dang por /
NK041(di)015:519: 'di ni khrus mchog dpal dang ldan //
NK041(di)015:520: zhes pa sngags bcas kyis snum bag sogs dag par bkrus /
NK041(di)015:521: de dag sku la sogs kyis sku dabyi'o //
NK041(di)015:522: des mtshon nas khrus bum brgyad pa'i bar 'gre zhing /
NK041(di)015:523: de nas byugs mnye'i rdzas rnams bzhag la /
NK041(di)015:524: khrus bum dang po kho nas bkru zhing sku dbyi ba /
NK041(di)015:525: dri byug cing gos zung dbul ba'i bar ro //
NK041(di)015:526: de dag gi tshe bdug spos 'thul ba dang me
NK041(di)015:527: tog gi char dbab cing rol mo 'khrol ba sogs
NK041(di)015:528: rnam pa du ma dang ldan par bya'o //
NK041(di)015:529: khrus rim 'di la dman mchog gi gnyis su dbye
NK041(di)015:530: ba'i rgyu mtshan gzhan du byung bas dpyad khong gcig
NK041(di)015:531: tu ma smos kyang don la gnas te /
NK041(di)015:532: nges pa skyed pa'i khungs du ma yod pas so //
NK041(di)015:533: des na brjod ma thag pa na dman khrus te /
NK041(di)015:534: mchog khrus ni sa dpyad bcu par 'chad 'gyur las shes so //
NK041(di)015:535: brgyad pa brten bskyed pa ni /
NK041(di)015:536: lhag gnas kyi ngo bo yin cing /
NK041(di)015:537: de yang dam tshig sems dpa'i sbyor ba ste sa
NK041(di)015:538: ma ya zhes pa dam tshig la 'jug pas sa
NK041(di)015:539: ma ti'i nges tshig gis bshad na 'gro ba dang
NK041(di)015:540: 'du ba la yang sbyar du yod pas /
NK041(di)015:541: lha ye shes pa rnams gang du 'gro zhing 'du ba'i gzhi yin pas so //
NK041(di)015:544: stong pa'i ngang las lhar bskyed pa dkyus bzhin no //
NK041(di)015:545: dgu pa ye shes pa spyan drang ba ni /
NK041(di)015:546: bdag dang rten gyi snying ga'i sogs nas ro gcig tu dgyes par bsam pa'i bar ro //
NK041(di)015:547: bcu pa rgyas gdab cing dbang bskur ba ni /
NK041(di)015:548: lha so so'i phyag rgya bzhis rgyas gdab cing mi nus na dkyus su bkod pa bzhin bya /
NK041(di)015:550: sbyang gzhi lha'i rgyud nyes pas rnyogs pa can du byas pa'i dri ma /
NK041(di)015:551: sbyong byed lha rnams chags pa chen pos zhu ba'i byang sems ye shes kyi chu rgyun /
NK041(di)015:552: sbyong ba po nam mkhar spyan drangs pa'i gdan gsum tshang ba'i lha rnams /
NK041(di)015:553: sbyangs 'bras dmigs med kyi rgyud dag pas ye shes
NK041(di)015:554: lha'i ngo bo khyad par can du sgrub pa dbang
NK041(di)015:555: bskur ba'i byed pa can te /
NK041(di)015:556: nges tshig dri ma bkru ba dang nus pa 'jog pa'i 'brel bas so //
NK041(di)015:558: dbang bskur bum pa thogs byas nas //
NK041(di)015:559: gdugs dang ba dan bskyed sogs bya //
NK041(di)015:560: bkra shis 'don cing rol mor bcas //
NK041(di)015:561: rab gnas lha la dbang bskur ro //
NK041(di)015:562: zhes 'byung bas na dbang lha spyan 'dren pa nas mnyes par bya ba'i bar ro //
NK041(di)015:563: bcu gcig pa mchod bstod sngags bzlas gtor ma btang ba ni /
NK041(di)015:564: rim pa gsum par lhag gnas kyi dbang gi rjes kho nar /
NK041(di)015:565: de nas rab gnas lha la ni //
NK041(di)015:566: mchod dang bstod nas dkyil 'khor lha'i //
NK041(di)015:567: bzlas pa brgya dang rtsa brgyad dang //
NK041(di)015:568: rten 'brel sngags kyang de bzhin bzla //
NK041(di)015:569: zhes gsungs pa'i rim pa bzhin du yi dam chos
NK041(di)015:570: skyong gi gtor ma rnams song nas phyi rol tu
NK041(di)015:571: phyogs skyong sogs 'jig rten pa'i gtor ma rnams phul
NK041(di)015:572: la dkyil 'khor khang pa'i sgor las bum gyi chus
NK041(di)015:573: bsang zhing spos kyis bdug nas nang du 'jug go
NK041(di)015:576: me tog la sogs sngon 'gro bas //
NK041(di)015:577: phyogs skyong rnams kyang mchod par bya //
NK041(di)015:579: bcu gnyis pa snyan gsan dbab pa ni /
NK041(di)015:580: rab gnas kyi cho ga'i las la gnang ba zhu ba dang /
NK041(di)015:581: rten de la nye bar gnas pa'i gsol ba gdab pa ste /
NK041(di)015:583: sngar dam tshig pa la dbab pa de la'o //
NK041(di)015:584: ji ltar na zhwa phud pus btsug rdor dril spos dang bcas pas /
NK041(di)015:585: badz+ra dzi ha sogs nas gnang ba sbyin ste mchod pa'i bar bya'o //
NK041(di)015:586: bcu gsum pa nongs pa 'chags shing gshegs su gsol ba ni /
NK041(di)015:587: yi ge brgya pa gsum gyi rjes su /
NK041(di)015:588: ma rnyed yongs su ma tshang dang //
NK041(di)015:590: +aahh+aum muhzhesa rten gyi ye shes pa mdun gyi nam
NK041(di)015:591: mkhar gshegs su gsol te mchod cing bstod pa rnams
NK041(di)015:592: so // 'dir ye shes pa gshegs pa dang dam
NK041(di)015:593: tshig pa gnas su 'jug pa sogs mi 'dra ba'i
NK041(di)015:594: khyad par ci rigs snang mod /
NK041(di)015:595: 'on kyang dkyil chog gi lha lhag gnas dang dgos pa mtshungs pas /
NK041(di)015:596: brjod ma thag pa bzhin bzung ngo //
NK041(di)015:597: bcu bzhi pa rten bsrung zhing dgab pa ni /
NK041(di)015:598: rten dam tshig par gsal ba'i gnas lngar dris byug cing mchod /
NK041(di)015:599: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i lag gis reg ste go bgos pa'i rjes su /
NK041(di)015:601: na bza' ser pos g.yogs par bya //
NK041(di)015:603: dper na rgyal rigs rgyal sar mnga' dbang ma bskur ba dang 'dra bas /
NK041(di)015:604: rab gnas ma zin pa'i lha ni mchod pa'i 'os su mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
NK041(di)015:606: bco lnga pa bdag la bsrung ba ni /
NK041(di)015:607: gnas gsum du yi ge gsum 'god sogs dkyus bzhin /
NK041(di)015:608: de ni sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga'i rjes
NK041(di)015:609: kyi bya ba rnams gshegs gsol ma gtogs bkra shis
NK041(di)015:610: kyi bar so so'i nges pa bzhin no //
NK041(di)015:611: de ltar bshad pa ni sngon du lhag par gnas pa'i cho ga'o //
NK041(di)015:612: gnyis pa cho ga dngos gzhi'i sdoms ni /
NK041(di)015:613: bdag mdun sgrub mchod sbyang bkru phyi //
NK041(di)015:614: gsol gdab rten bskyed spyan drangs la //
NK041(di)015:615: dgug cing rgyas gdab dbang bskur bya //
NK041(di)015:616: mchod bstod spyan sogs dbye rten bsgyur //
NK041(di)015:617: mnga' dbul rnam bzhi brtan bzhugs so //
NK041(di)015:619: nangs par snga bar langs te sngar 'du byas pa'i
NK041(di)015:620: yo byad rnams tshang zhing bkod legs par bshams la
NK041(di)015:621: khrus byas rgyan dang ldan pas /
NK041(di)015:622: bdag gi rnal 'byor rdzogs par bsgom zhing mdun gyi
NK041(di)015:623: dkyil 'khor gsal btab la de dang 'brel ba'i mchod
NK041(di)015:624: gtor sogs rim pa gsum par gtor ma btang la
NK041(di)015:625: nyi ma 'char kar na zhes 'byung bas phyi rol
NK041(di)015:626: gtor ma nam langs la 'grub par bya'o //
NK041(di)015:627: sngon du 'gro bas sbyangs khrus la 'jug pa'am /
NK041(di)015:628: skabs yod na dbang nod pa dang /
NK041(di)015:629: khrus bum gyi bskyed bzlas sogs kyang bya zhing /
NK041(di)015:630: de nas gnyis pa dang gsum pa sbyang khrus te gos zung dbul ba'i bar sngar bzhin no //
NK041(di)015:631: gzhung gzhan las 'dir ring bsrel 'jug par bshad kyang
NK041(di)015:632: cho ga'i dkyus su mi bde bas sngon du brjod
NK041(di)015:633: pa'i skabs de nyid du bya ba legs so //
NK041(di)015:634: bzhi pa gsol gdab sems bskyed ni /
NK041(di)015:635: snam sbyar sogs gyon nas langs te me tog dang rdor dril bzung /
NK041(di)015:638: chen po sogs te gus shing 'dud pa'i stobs kyis spos rol me tog gis 'thor ba rnams so //
NK041(di)015:639: lnga pa rten bskyed pa dang /
NK041(di)015:640: drug pa ye shes pa spyan drangs pa /
NK041(di)015:641: phyi 'brang gi bgegs bsal ba'i bar sngar bzhin las /
NK041(di)015:642: khyad par de'i tshe byon pa'i ye shes pa rnams
NK041(di)015:643: sta gon gyi dus stegs bu dang gnyis med du
NK041(di)015:644: gyur pa la byon legs bzhugs gsol /
NK041(di)015:645: mchod cing dgug gzhug bcing mnyes ro gcig tu gyur pa'i bar te /
NK041(di)015:647: nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun //
NK041(di)015:648: sku gzugs snying gar rab tu gzhug /
NK041(di)015:650: bdun pa rgyas gdab sngar bzhin /
NK041(di)015:651: brgyad pa dbang bskur ba ni /
NK041(di)015:653: phyag rgya sngags kyis rab bskul la //
NK041(di)015:654: ji ltar 'os pas mngon dbang bskur //
NK041(di)015:656: slob ma la ji ltar bya ba bzhin bskur te /
NK041(di)015:658: ji ltar gling bzhi'i dbang phyug gis //
NK041(di)015:659: 'khor lo bsgyur ba dbang bskur ba //
NK041(di)015:660: de bzhin basngagasa pa'i ngo mtshar dang //
NK041(di)015:661: bkra shis kun gyis dbang bskur ro //
NK041(di)015:663: de yang chu dbang ni dngos sam me long gi gzugs brnyan dang /
NK041(di)015:664: de bzhin du dbu rgyan sogs kyang bcings pa'am lhag par mos par dag gis bya ba las /
NK041(di)015:665: cho ga ni rang gzhung so sor 'byung ba ltar ram /
NK041(di)015:666: snying ga'i sa bon gyis dbang lha spyan drangs mchod
NK041(di)015:667: bstod gsol ba gdab pa sngon du 'gro bas chu
NK041(di)015:669: bum dbang bzhi rigs bdag gis dbu brgyan pa'i bar dkyus bzhin no //
NK041(di)015:670: de ltar bu'i tshul gyi dbang bskur bas /
NK041(di)015:671: snga ma lngas phung khams ye shes lnga dang /
NK041(di)015:672: phyi ma bzhis sgo gsum ye shes sems dpa'i ngo
NK041(di)015:673: bor byas pas slob dpon sbyin por byas pa'i rgyud
NK041(di)015:674: dag nas sbyangs 'bras myur du thob pa'i don can
NK041(di)015:675: de sngar bshad pa'i rgyu mtshan kyang 'brel lo //
NK041(di)015:676: dgu pa mchod bstod bya ba ni /
NK041(di)015:677: dbang bskur ba'i rjes su slob ma mchod pa gzhung
NK041(di)015:678: du mar bshad pa bzhin dbang gis rjes 'brang ste
NK041(di)015:679: / phyogs bcu rab 'byams mas mchod cing /
NK041(di)015:680: 'gro ba rgyud lnga sogs kyis bstod par bya'o //
NK041(di)015:681: bcu pa spyan sogs dbye ba ni /
NK041(di)015:683: der ni gser gyi rang bzhin gyi //
NK041(di)015:684: thur mas spyan ni dbye bar bya //
NK041(di)015:685: zhes skye mched kyi thog ma smos pas snyan sogs dbye bar mtshon pa ste /
NK041(di)015:686: rim pa gsum pa sogs tshad ldan gyi gzhung du mar bshad cing /
NK041(di)015:687: rten ye shes kyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par byed pa yang skye mched de dag las te /
NK041(di)015:688: ye shes kyi spyod yul longs spyod thams cad mtshungs par spyod dgos pas so //
NK041(di)015:689: gang gis dbye na sku gzugs sogs che chung dang
NK041(di)015:690: yon bdag gi bsam pa dang bstun nas drug mtho
NK041(di)015:692: nam las mi chung ba'i gser gyi thur ma dang /
NK041(di)015:693: snyan brud rmangs tsher zhal thur /
NK041(di)015:696: ji ltar mig mkhan rgyal po yis //
NK041(di)015:697: zhes sogs kyis rim pa bzhin dabye'o //
NK041(di)015:698: glegs bam mchod rten sogs la ji ltar zhe na /
NK041(di)015:699: 'dir rten bsgyur ma zin pas bde mod /
NK041(di)015:700: gzhan du pusti la sogs pa'i lha ni me long la de'i gzugs brnyan sgom pa'o //
NK041(di)015:701: zhes bshad pas kyang shes so //
NK041(di)015:703: gal te glegs bam yin na yang //
NK041(di)015:704: sngon bzhin yig 'brur bsgyur ba dang //
NK041(di)015:705: de yang spyan dbye mchod sogs bya //
NK041(di)015:707: sngon du rten bsgyur 'byung ba ltar na dbye yul
NK041(di)015:708: ye shes kyi sku can yin pas skye mched kyi
NK041(di)015:709: rnam par mi dgos pa 'dra ste /
NK041(di)015:710: dper na mchod rten dang glegs bam sogs mchod pa'i
NK041(di)015:711: tshe yang zhal phyag gi rnam pa can du yod
NK041(di)015:712: dgos par 'gyur ba dang mtshungs pa nyid do //
NK041(di)015:714: mchod rten glegs bam la sogs la //
NK041(di)015:715: dbang po skye mched med pa'i phyir //
NK041(di)015:716: spyan dbye la sogs bya mi dgos //
NK041(di)015:717: zhes rnam dbye phye nas so sor bshad mod kyang snga ma nyid btsan par zungs shig /
NK041(di)015:718: bcu gcig pa rten bsgyur ba ni /
NK041(di)015:720: so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis //
NK041(di)015:721: dkyil 'khor lha dang der bsgyur bsam //
NK041(di)015:722: zhes gsungs pas slob dpon gyi rdo rje dang bcas
NK041(di)015:723: pa'i lag gis rten gyi gnas gsum du reg cing
NK041(di)015:724: / rang sngags lan gsum brjod pas der bsgyur ba
NK041(di)015:725: ste ston pa'i sku sngar rnam snang du bskyed pa
NK041(di)015:727: mu ne sogs gsum gyi mthar /
NK041(di)015:728: bcom ldan 'das dpal rnam par snang mdzad yongs su
NK041(di)015:729: gyur ba las rgyal ba sh+aakya thub pa sku mdog
NK041(di)015:730: gser btso ma lta bu mtshan dpe'i gzi byin mchog
NK041(di)015:731: tu 'bar ba phyag gnyis sa gnon dang mnyam bzhag
NK041(di)015:732: mdzad pa mchog gi sprul sku'i cha byad can mtshan
NK041(di)015:733: nyid thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i nas mthu byin
NK041(di)015:734: dang ldan par gyur gyi bar ro //
NK041(di)015:735: gzhung la lar brtan bzhugs kyi gsol btab tshar ba'i
NK041(di)015:736: rjes su rten bsgyur ni nges pa'i bshad khungs ma
NK041(di)015:737: mthong zhing / 'thad par yang mi sems so //
NK041(di)015:738: bcu gnyis pa mnga' dbul ba ni /
NK041(di)015:739: dper na rgyal rigs rgyal sar bkod pa na zhang
NK041(di)015:740: blon dang rgyal phran rnams kyis skyes kyi rnam pa
NK041(di)015:741: che thang phul bas mnga' gsol ba'am mnga' bskur bar
NK041(di)015:742: 'gyur ba bzhin 'di yang de ltar te /
NK041(di)015:743: rten de lha ye shes pa'i ngo bor gsar du
NK041(di)015:744: sgrub pa la dgyes pa sgron pa'i dga' ston gyi
NK041(di)015:745: skyes su mnga' gsol ba'i don gyis so //
NK041(di)015:747: rta mchog rol pa'i rgyud du /
NK041(di)015:748: bkra shis mnga' gsol dbang bskur nas //
NK041(di)015:749: sku gzugs mchod pa'i rten bya'o //
NK041(di)015:751: dgongs 'dus rab gnas bkra shis brtsegs pa dang bod /
NK041(di)015:752: snga rabs pa'i phyag bzhes bzhin /
NK041(di)015:753: mchod bstod rgyas pas mnga' dbul ba /
NK041(di)015:754: nyer mkho'i yo byad kyis mnga' dbul ba /
NK041(di)015:755: sbyin sreg gam ts+aa ru'i bza' bas mnga' dbul ba /
NK041(di)015:756: rab gnas kyi sngags dang bkra shis kyis mnga' dbul ba'o //
NK041(di)015:758: rab gnas byas pa'i lha de'i mchod bstod rang gzhung bzhin no //
NK041(di)015:763: nang gi dam tshig rnams kyis mchod cing /
NK041(di)015:764: 'gro ba rgyud lnga sogs kyis bstod par bya'o //
NK041(di)015:766: sku gsung thugs rten spyi dang bye brag gi nyer mkho'i yo byad rnams dngos sam /
NK041(di)015:767: bris pa rten so sor 'bul ba'i tshul gyis mnga' dbul gyi man+dala mthar rim pa bzhin 'god /
NK041(di)015:769: rab gnas rgyas par mchod gar kyang byed /
NK041(di)015:770: byas pa'i lha rnams la me tog gis mtshon par
NK041(di)015:771: thab tu spyan drangs rgyas pa'i sreg blugs cho ga
NK041(di)015:772: bzhin du phul ba'i mthar yon bdag kyang dbul du
NK041(di)015:773: gzhug cing / de'i rjes su 'o ma dang /
NK041(di)015:775: mar sbrang rtsi ka ra rnams rang gi 'dod lha'i
NK041(di)015:776: sa bon las byung bar bsam la nag po ma
NK041(di)015:777: yin pa'i snod gtsang ma dris byugs shing me tog
NK041(di)015:778: gi phreng ba bcings pa'i nang du dgang blugs kyi
NK041(di)015:779: gzar bus blugs la many+dzi sogs kyi steng du bkod
NK041(di)015:780: nas sbyin sreg gi thab tu bzhag /
NK041(di)015:781: rang lha'i rnal 'byor gyis rdzas lnga po bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin du bltas la /
NK041(di)015:782: d+ai bya an+ti sa ma d+hi d+h+ya na sh+r+ai na ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)015:783: zhes bzla zhing bskor nas rten dang dkyil 'khor gyi lha thams cad la /
NK041(di)015:786: rang gi ngo bo'i sgo nas rtsa ba'i ro mngar /
NK041(di)015:791: ska ba drug la re re bzhin /
NK041(di)015:792: mngar ba'i mngar ba sogs drug tu dbye zhing /
NK041(di)015:793: de bzhin du skyur ba sogs la yang mtshon nas so drug /
NK041(di)015:794: de dag so so'i rang bzhin lce'i yul du gsal bar myong bas so drug /
NK041(di)015:795: lto ba'i gnas su nus pa smin pa so drug
NK041(di)015:796: ste brgya dang brgyad yin kyang brjod bde'i phyir brgya
NK041(di)015:797: zhes smos pa'o // ro brgya sogs kyis 'bul /
NK041(di)015:798: de ltar ma grub na dkyus bzhin dang /
NK041(di)015:799: tshogs kyi 'khor los kyang dgyes pa sgron no //
NK041(di)015:801: rten gyi thugs kar gzungs thag gtad pa nas /
NK041(di)015:802: ye d+har+m+aa ci mang bzlas pa'i bar dang /
NK041(di)015:803: sngar 'du byas pa'i me long gzungs bum kha'i me tog gi khar bzhag /
NK041(di)015:804: de'i rten 'brel snying po re re bzhin tshar bdun bdun bzlas pa lag g.yas pa /
NK041(di)015:805: bum chus sbyangs nas lag g.yon pas /
NK041(di)015:806: me tog la sbran pa'i char dbab cing /
NK041(di)015:808: phun sum tshogs pa sogs bkra shis kyi tshig rgya
NK041(di)015:809: cher brjod cing snyan pa'i rol mo'i tshogs kyang 'khrol
NK041(di)015:810: bar bya'o // bcu gsum pa brtan bzhugs ni /
NK041(di)015:812: khri yi steng du bzhugs par bya //
NK041(di)015:813: sku gzugs kyi ni sum 'gyur cha //
NK041(di)015:814: tshad tsam du ni rab tu bsgrags //
NK041(di)015:815: su pra tish+tha badz+re s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)015:816: me tog la sogs sngon 'gro bas //
NK041(di)015:819: mdun phyogs su ni ma bub cing //
NK041(di)015:820: yo ba med cing drang ba yis //
NK041(di)015:821: de ltar sku gzugs mdzes par dgod //
NK041(di)015:822: zhes gsungs pas na sku'i sum cha'i tshad tsam gyi khri la spyan drangs te /
NK041(di)015:823: su pra tish+tha badz+re s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)015:824: zhes drang zhing brtan par bzhugs su gsol /
NK041(di)015:825: nyer spyod lngas mchod cing rten gyi khri'am me tog
NK041(di)015:826: gi phreng ba btags pa na yon mchod thams cad
NK041(di)015:827: kyis bzung la rab gnas kyi sngags rnams skabs dang
NK041(di)015:829: slar yang me tog dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar bas btud de /
NK041(di)015:830: ji srid sa chu me dang ni //
NK041(di)015:832: dngos grub ma lus stsal du gsol //
NK041(di)015:833: zhes pa'i bar lan gsum brjod cing me tog gi char dbab bo //
NK041(di)015:834: de nyid brtan par byin gyis brlabs nas slar yang mchod cing bstod nas shis par bya'o //
NK041(di)015:835: de ltar ye shes pa gzhug nas brtan bzhugs 'khor
NK041(di)015:836: bcas kyi bar 'di dag ni rab gnas kyi cho
NK041(di)015:837: ga dngos te / jo bo'i gzhung las /
NK041(di)015:838: dam tshig sems dpa' sbyangs bskyed la //
NK041(di)015:839: ye shes sems dpa' yun ring du //
NK041(di)015:840: gnas pa'i phyir na rab tu gnas //
NK041(di)015:842: gsum pa cho ga'i mjug gi sdoms ni /
NK041(di)015:843: gtor ma bsrung bsgo mchod bstod gsol //
NK041(di)015:844: nongs bshags gshegs gsol yon bdag bsgo //
NK041(di)015:845: shis brjod rten mchod dga' ston yon //
NK041(di)015:846: bsngo shis rjes bsdu sbyin sreg go //
NK041(di)015:847: zhes 'byung ba'i dang po gtor ma btang ba ni /
NK041(di)015:848: 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gtor ma rnams so so'i gzhung bzhin btang ngo //
NK041(di)015:849: gnyis pa srung ma bsgo ba ni /
NK041(di)015:850: slob dpon mi bskyod rdo rjes /
NK041(di)015:851: de nas srung ma bsgo ba ni //
NK041(di)015:852: rang nyid lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas //
NK041(di)015:853: nag po chen po dgug pa dang //
NK041(di)015:854: gzhug dang bcing dang dbang du bya //
NK041(di)015:855: de la mchod dang gtor ma sbyin //
NK041(di)015:856: de la bka' lung bsgo bya ba //
NK041(di)015:857: zhes sogs gsungs pa'i tshul gyis gtsug lag khang sogs
NK041(di)015:858: rab gnas byas pa'i rten de'i srung mar 'os pa
NK041(di)015:859: rnams la slar yang mchod gtor 'bul ba dang bstod
NK041(di)015:860: pa sogs so so'i cho ga'i gzhung bzhin du phrin
NK041(di)015:863: dam mnan dang bka' bsgo'i bsrung zhing legs par skyong bar mdzod //
NK041(di)015:864: ces pa'i rjes su chos skyong ba'i srung ma 'khor
NK041(di)015:865: dang bcas pa khyed rnams kyis deng 'dir rab tu
NK041(di)015:866: gnas par byas pa'i rten 'di dag phyi ma'i mu
NK041(di)015:867: mthar thug gi bar du bsrung zhing skyong ba dang
NK041(di)015:869: bdag dang yon gyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa
NK041(di)015:870: rnams la yang 'gal rkyen mi mthun pa'i phyogs thams
NK041(di)015:872: mthun rkyen chos dang mthun pa'i bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub pa'i phrin las mdzod cig /
NK041(di)015:873: ces bsgos la srung ma'i gtor skyong dang /
NK041(di)015:874: brtan bzhugs sogs rjes kyi cho ga rnams bya'o //
NK041(di)015:875: gsum pa mchod cing bstod nas gsol ba gdab pa ni /
NK041(di)015:876: dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams la gtang rag gi don
NK041(di)015:877: du gsar du bshams pa'am kha gsos pa'i mchod pa
NK041(di)015:880: sa dang chu dang me rlung las //
NK041(di)015:881: sogs kyis 'dod don gsol ba gdab /
NK041(di)015:882: bzhi pa bzod par gsol nas gshegs su gsol ba ni /
NK041(di)015:883: dkyil 'khor lan gsum bskor g.yas skor /
NK041(di)015:884: nas shar sgor mngon du phyogs pas 'dug ste /
NK041(di)015:885: yi ge brgya pa lan gsum gyi mthar /
NK041(di)015:886: ma rnyed yongs su ma tshang dang //
NK041(di)015:887: zhes sogs kyis bzod par gsol //
NK041(di)015:888: khyed kyis sems can sogs kyis dkyil 'khor gyi ye shes pa gshegs /
NK041(di)015:889: dam tshig pa bdag nyid la bsdu zhing /
NK041(di)015:890: go cha bcings pa sogs rang gzhung bzhin no //
NK041(di)015:891: lnga pa yon bdag bsgo ba ni /
NK041(di)015:892: stan bzang po la 'bru'i g.yung drung bris pa /
NK041(di)015:893: yon bdag 'khod pa'i mdun du de'i g.yas nas 'go bzung ba'i nyer spyod lnga tshar gcig bshams la /
NK041(di)015:894: slob dpon gyi rab rgyud tshig /
NK041(di)015:895: mdo sngags kyi lung rig dang sbyar ba'i bshad pa rgyas pa'am mi nus na /
NK041(di)015:898: zhes khyed kyis nga la gsol ba btab pa bzhin
NK041(di)015:899: du rab tu gnas pa legs par grub par byas
NK041(di)015:900: kyis khyed kyis rten 'di la zhag bdun gyi bar
NK041(di)015:901: du mchod pa rgya chen po gyis shig /
NK041(di)015:902: de nas kyang ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa rgyun mi chad par gyis shig ces bsgos la /
NK041(di)015:903: sngar bshams pa'i mchod pa rnams yon bdag la 'bul
NK041(di)015:904: du bzhug pa'am mi shes na des phul bar mos
NK041(di)015:905: la rab 'byams rgya mtsho sogs kyis yon bdag gi
NK041(di)015:906: lag tu rim pa bzhin thogs /
NK041(di)015:907: tshig dang bstun nas las kyi rdo rjes rten gyi drung du 'bul /
NK041(di)015:908: tshogs pa thams cad kyis 'bul zhing bskor ba gsum dang phyag gsum /
NK041(di)015:910: drug pa de nyid bkra shis par bya ba ni /
NK041(di)015:911: slar yang yon bdag stan la 'khod pa bsang gtor byas /
NK041(di)015:912: de yi las thams cad pa'i sngags dang bum chus /
NK041(di)015:914: dam gyi lhar bskyed pa'i lag tu me tog gtad la phyag byed du gzhug go //
NK041(di)015:915: de nas bkra shis la bar du gcod pa'i bgegs sbyang ba'i /
NK041(di)015:917: deng 'dir rab tu gnas par byas pa'i rten dang
NK041(di)015:918: sbyin pa'i bdag po 'khor bcas bkra shis par byed
NK041(di)015:919: pa la bar du gcod par byed pa'i bgegs tshogs
NK041(di)015:920: thams cad 'dir ma gnas par sogs dang spos rol
NK041(di)015:921: drag sngags yungs thun dang bcas pas tsham rngams bya
NK041(di)015:922: / bkra shis kyi rdzas rnams rin po che'i snod
NK041(di)015:923: 'brus bkang ba'i khar bzhag pa slob dpon gyi mdun
NK041(di)015:924: / du bkod / de nyid bsang sbyang /
NK041(di)015:925: stong pa'i ngang las m+aam las byung ba'i grub pa'i
NK041(di)015:926: bkra shis kyi rdzas brgyad rang rang gi phun sum
NK041(di)015:927: tshogs pa'i dngos po thams cad sgrub pa'i mthu dang
NK041(di)015:928: ldan par bsam la rim pa bzhin thogs te /
NK041(di)015:929: sngon yang dag par rdzogs pa'ii sangs rgyas sh+aakya thub pa la /
NK041(di)015:930: gzugs kyi lha mo 'od 'chang mas me long phul
NK041(di)015:931: bas bkra shis pa'i rdzas su byin gyis brlabs pa
NK041(di)015:932: de bzhin du / deng 'dir yang rab tu gnas
NK041(di)015:933: par byas pa'i rten dang bdag dang sbyin pa'i bdag
NK041(di)015:934: pos gtso byas sems can thams cad me long gi
NK041(di)015:935: rdzas kyis bkra shis par gyur cig /
NK041(di)015:936: me long ye shes sogs brjod /
NK041(di)015:937: de bzhin du glang po che sa srungs kyis sman gi wang phul bas /
NK041(di)015:938: gi wang dug gsum 'joms pa sogs /
NK041(di)015:939: zhing pa'i bu mo legs skyes mas zho phul bas /
NK041(di)015:940: zho ni kun gyi snying por sogs /
NK041(di)015:941: bram ze kun+da lis rtsa d+aurba phul bas /
NK041(di)015:943: shing gi lha mos shing tog bilba phul bas /
NK041(di)015:945: lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis dung dkar po g.yas su 'khyil ba phul bas /
NK041(di)015:946: dung ni chos kyi sgra sogs /
NK041(di)015:947: sa'i lha mo brtan mas li khri phul bas /
NK041(di)015:949: gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rjes yungs kar phul bas /
NK041(di)015:950: yungs kar rdo rje'i rigs sogs /
NK041(di)015:951: re re bzhin tshigs bcad rdzogs pa dang las kyi
NK041(di)015:952: rdo rjes rten dang der 'khod pa thams cad la
NK041(di)015:953: 'bul tshul byas rjes yon bdag la gtad do //
NK041(di)015:954: la la dag r+ts+wa tshong pa bkra shis ldan /
NK041(di)015:956: li khri bram ze dkar rgyal /
NK041(di)015:957: rnams gzhan brjod pa ni nges pa'i khungs ma mthong zhing 'thad par mi sems /
NK041(di)015:958: 'dir ni mdo dbang dang bu ston gyi gsung mthun par 'byung ba bzhin byas so //
NK041(di)015:959: gzhan yang bkra shis rgya cher brjod cing rol mo'i
NK041(di)015:960: sgra dang bcas pas me tog gi char dbab bo
NK041(di)015:961: // bdun pa rten mchod pa ni /
NK041(di)015:962: rten nyer spyod lngas mchod cing bstod nas smon lam rgyas par //
NK041(di)015:964: gdab cing bskor ba rnams so //
NK041(di)015:965: brgyad pa dga' ston bya ba ni /
NK041(di)015:967: rab gnas yang dag rdzogs dus su //
NK041(di)015:968: bstod dang bkra shis brjod bya zhing //
NK041(di)015:969: bro dang gar sogs sil snyan sgra //
NK041(di)015:970: ji ltar rnyed pas rab tu mchod //
NK041(di)015:971: ces pas slob dpon dang bzo bo grogs byed dang
NK041(di)015:972: bcas pa mtha' dag la bza' btung dang gos rgyan
NK041(di)015:973: glu gar la sogs pa'i bsnyen bkur rgyas par bya
NK041(di)015:974: zhing / las kyi rdo rjes sngar phul ba'i ts+aa ru'i lhag ma rnams /
NK041(di)015:975: bde gshegs lhag mas khyab par brim /
NK041(di)015:978: glang po rta dang shing rta nor //
NK041(di)015:979: yon gyi dam pa dbul bar bya //
NK041(di)015:980: de bas de la nan tan gyis //
NK041(di)015:981: longs spyod g.yo ba dbul bar bya //
NK041(di)015:982: gal te lha nyid dgyes 'dod na //
NK041(di)015:983: bla ma gus pas dgyes bya zhing //
NK041(di)015:985: rgyud rnams ma lus pa yis ni //
NK041(di)015:986: phyi nas bzo bo rnams la mchod //
NK041(di)015:987: gang dag de la grogs byed pa //
NK041(di)015:988: gzhan dag kyang ni mchod par bya //
NK041(di)015:990: de'i rjes su 'brang ba rnams dang /
NK041(di)015:991: bzo bo grogs byed sogs ci 'byor ba'i yon gyis mnyes par bya'o //
NK041(di)015:993: las byas don yod par bya ba'i phyir bsngo bas rgyas gdab par bya'o //
NK041(di)015:994: bcu gcig pa slar yang shis par bya ba ni /
NK041(di)015:995: bkra shis yon bdag yul gnyan na dpon slob thams cad bzhengs /
NK041(di)015:997: dkyus ma la thams cad mi bzhengs /
NK041(di)015:998: kyi tshig mang po brjod cing rol mo'i sgra dang bcas pas me tog gi char dbab bo //
NK041(di)015:999: bcu gnyis pa las kyi rjes bsdu ba ni /
NK041(di)015:1000: rang lha'i nga rgyal gyis a k+aa ro brjod pa dang dril bu gsil la /
NK041(di)015:1001: rdul tshon bsdus phur bu phyung ba sogs nas bkra
NK041(di)015:1002: shis kyi bar cho ga so so'i gzhung bzhin no
NK041(di)015:1003: // de nas dkyil 'khor gyi yo byad ni /
NK041(di)015:1005: de ltar thams cad byas zin nas //
NK041(di)015:1006: gang rung mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor la //
NK041(di)015:1007: phul lam dbul ba byed pa rnams //
NK041(di)015:1008: slob dpon la ni dbul bya yi //
NK041(di)015:1009: zhes gsogs gsungs pa ltar byas pa'i dang des kyang
NK041(di)015:1010: ji ltar 'os pa'i mchod sbyin du spel bar gsungs
NK041(di)015:1012: ba yi lci bas byug bya zhing //
NK041(di)015:1013: rdul tshon chu bor dor bar bya //
NK041(di)015:1014: zhes gsungs pas rdul tshon rnams bkur sti chen pos chu bor dor zhing /
NK041(di)015:1015: gzhi de yang ba'i lag len khrus kyi ba byung lags /
NK041(di)015:1017: bcu gsum pa sbyin sreg bya ba ni /
NK041(di)015:1019: lha tshims bar gcod bgegs la sogs //
NK041(di)015:1020: zhi phyir sbyin sreg cho ga bya //
NK041(di)015:1021: gang 'dod dngos grub sbyin byed cing //
NK041(di)015:1022: rtog sgrib la sogs sreg par byed //
NK041(di)015:1023: ces pas cho ga'i chad lhag gi nyes pa rnams
NK041(di)015:1024: kha gso ba'i phyir zhi ba'i sbyin sreg cho ga
NK041(di)015:1026: ma grub na yi ge brgya pa mang du brjod pas kha skong /
NK041(di)015:1027: de ltar cho ga rgyas pa'i rim pa dang sbyar ba'i lag len bstan nas /
NK041(di)015:1028: da ni cho ga 'bring po dang /
NK041(di)015:1030: shas cher bsdus pa rnams kyi tshe gzhung du bstan
NK041(di)015:1031: pa'i sa dpyad so so'i steng du brjod ma thag
NK041(di)015:1032: pa'i lag len rim pa bzhin sbyar ba'i shes pa
NK041(di)015:1033: yod do // dgos pa'i dbang gis shin tu bsdus
NK041(di)015:1034: par byed na bdag gi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas
NK041(di)015:1035: yod do // / gnas bya stong pa'i ngang las rang rang gi dam tshig par bskyed /
NK041(di)015:1036: rang gi snying ga'i sa bon las byung ba'i 'od
NK041(di)015:1037: kyis de'i ye shes pa spyan drangs nas gzhug cing
NK041(di)015:1038: rgyas gdab / slar yang dbang lha spyan drangs nas dbang bskur /
NK041(di)015:1039: mchod cing bstod nas spyan dbye /
NK041(di)015:1041: su pra tish+tha badz+re s+w+aa h+aa /
NK041(di)015:1042: zhes bzlas te me tog gi char dbab cing brtan bzhugs dang bkra shis bya'o //
NK041(di)015:1043: de ltar sku gzugs la sogs pa rab tu gnas pa'i lag len bshad zin to //
NK041(di)015:1044: gsum pa cho ga'i yan lag gzhan bshad pa la /
NK041(di)015:1045: rig pa sogs kyi rab gnas dang //
NK041(di)015:1050: stong pa'i ngang las 'khor lo pad+ma rdo ra me sogs gang yin der bskyed /
NK041(di)015:1051: yig 'bru rnams lha gang gi sngags yin pa de'i 'od dpag med du bsgom /
NK041(di)015:1052: ming spel rnams bsrung bya gang yin der bltas la dgug cing bstiim /
NK041(di)015:1054: dbang bskur nas mchod bstod byas la rang sngags brgya rtsa bzlas /
NK041(di)015:1055: de zhu ba'i srung 'khor nad gdon bar chad thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa'i /
NK041(di)015:1056: du bsam la brtan bzhugs dang bkra shis brjod cing me tog 'thor /
NK041(di)015:1057: zhar la srung mdud ces pa dar ram srad bu
NK041(di)015:1058: g.yon gyi sor mo la lan gnyis su dkris pa'i
NK041(di)015:1059: bar du sne gcig bcug nas 'then pas mdud pa
NK041(di)015:1060: rdo rje rtse gsum pa lta bu 'byung /
NK041(di)015:1061: de lhar bskyed la rang sngags kyis gdab cing bsrung byar zhu ba'i mdud par bsams nas /
NK041(di)015:1063: khungs ni slob ma lhag gnas kyi skabs dang gzhan yang mang ngo //
NK041(di)015:1065: rigs lnga po gang gi rdor dril yin kyang rdo rje ni rnam snang sogs lnga dang /
NK041(di)015:1066: dril bu rnams spyan ma sogs lnga ste rang rigs kyi dam tshig par bskyed /
NK041(di)015:1067: ye shes pa dgug bstim rgyas gdab /
NK041(di)015:1068: dbang bskur nas mchod bstod byas la rang sngags bzla /
NK041(di)015:1069: de zhu ba'i rdor dril du bsam la brtan bzhugs dang bkra shis brjod /
NK041(di)015:1071: bo d+hi tsi ru rak+sha rus pa la sogs rang rigs dang mthun par bsang sbyang /
NK041(di)015:1072: stong pa'i ngang las mdud 'dzin so so'i 'khor los
NK041(di)015:1073: sgyur ba dang gzhan rnams rang rang gi snying po
NK041(di)015:1075: ye shes pa dgug bstim rgyas gdab /
NK041(di)015:1076: dbang bskur nas mchod bstod byas la rang sngags dang /
NK041(di)015:1077: sarba ta th+aa ga ta ma h+aa d+har+m+aa su smri te su pra tish+tha sa ma ye h'u /
NK041(di)015:1078: zhes bzla zhing brtan bzhugs dang bkra shis brjod /
NK041(di)015:1079: rigs lnga'i cod pan sogs rin po che'i rgyan rab gnas ni /
NK041(di)015:1081: stong pa'i ngang las rin 'byung dam tshig par bskyed /
NK041(di)015:1082: ye shes pa dgug bstim rgyas gdab dbang bskur nas mchod bstod byas la rang sngags bzla /
NK041(di)015:1083: de zhu ba'i rgyan char bsam la brtan bzhugs dang bkra shis brjod /
NK041(di)015:1084: rdzing dang khron pa sogs kyi rab gnas ni /
NK041(di)015:1085: de'i 'gram du rnam snang gi dkyil 'khor byas la gtor ma btang /
NK041(di)015:1087: stong pa'i ngang las rnam snang du bskyed /
NK041(di)015:1088: de zhu ba'i chu lha dkar po stod lha'i rnam pa sbrul mgo'i gdengs ka can ut+pala dang /
NK041(di)015:1089: sbrul zhags 'dzin pa ro smad sbrul du 'khyil ba dam tshig par bltas la /
NK041(di)015:1090: rnam snang ye shes par bcug nas sa ma ya s+t+wam /
NK041(di)015:1092: dbang bskur mchod bstod zhu ba las yan lag brgyad dri bzang ba /
NK041(di)015:1099: lto ba la mi gnod pa'o //
NK041(di)015:1100: ldan gyi chu gser gyi sa gzhi'i bar khyab cing
NK041(di)015:1101: klu rnams kyi rten gnas su gyur par bsam la
NK041(di)015:1102: / der mchod sdong gi shing btsugs pas sam /
NK041(di)015:1103: ma 'byor na dbus su chu lha phyogs mtshams su klu chen po brgyad kyis bskor bar bsam la /
NK041(di)015:1104: ye shes pa dgug gzhug sogs sngar bzhin byas nas
NK041(di)015:1105: 'o ma la sogs pa'i gtor ma phul te yun
NK041(di)015:1106: du bzhugs par gsol gdab bo //
NK041(di)015:1107: skyed mos tshal sogs rab gnas byed na /
NK041(di)015:1110: gtso bo bzhin rnam snang du bskyed /
NK041(di)015:1111: ye shes pa dgug bstim rgyas gdab /
NK041(di)015:1112: dbang bskur mchod bstod byas nas /
NK041(di)015:1113: de zhu ba'i shing gi tshogs su bsam la me tog 'thor /
NK041(di)015:1114: 'bras bu la sogs pas phan 'dogs pa'i phyir brtan bzhugs dang bkra shis brjod /
NK041(di)015:1115: gzhan yang gru sogs las rigs kyi khro bo dam tshig par bskyed /
NK041(di)015:1116: ye shes pa dgug sogs byas nas zhu ba'i grur bsam la bkra shis brjod /
NK041(di)015:1117: go khrab sogs h'u mdzad dam tshig par bskyed /
NK041(di)015:1118: ye shes pa dgug sogs byas nas zhu ba'i rdo rje'i go khrab tu bsam la bkra shis brjod /
NK041(di)015:1119: nor bu'i rigs rnams rnam sras sogs dam tshig par bskyed /
NK041(di)015:1120: ye shes pa dgug sogs byas nas zhu ba'i nor bur bsam la bkra shis brjod /
NK041(di)015:1121: rgyal mtshan ni rnam snang dam tshig par bskyed /
NK041(di)015:1122: ye shes pa dgug sogs byas nas zhu ba'i rgyal mtshan du bsam la bkra shis brjod /
NK041(di)015:1123: gdugs sogs mchod pa'i yo byad mang po zhig rang
NK041(di)015:1124: rang gi gzugs kyis dgos pa sgrub nus su yun
NK041(di)015:1125: ring por byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsam pas rab gnas
NK041(di)015:1126: kyi sngags mang du bzlas nas bkra shis brjod pa
NK041(di)015:1127: yin / de thams cad la rang nyid lha'i rnal 'byor dang ldan par ni nges par dgos so //
NK041(di)015:1128: gnyis pa bu ston gyis mchod yon gyi cho ga
NK041(di)015:1129: zhes bshad pa ltar na arga yin nam rtag tu
NK041(di)015:1130: bskyed par bshad / arga'i zhes pa rin thang la
NK041(di)015:1131: 'jug pas rgyu ngan pa bzang por byed pa la
NK041(di)015:1132: bskyed par bshad / bshad snang / cho ga la /
NK041(di)015:1133: rten gsar pa bzhengs pa dang /
NK041(di)015:1134: rnying pa gso ba'i rim pa gnyis las /
NK041(di)015:1136: dus tshes dge ba la bdag gi rnal 'byor sngon
NK041(di)015:1137: du 'gro bas sku gzugs kyi rgyu dang gzhan du
NK041(di)015:1138: rten gyi rgyu byed par 'gyur ba'i lha'i gzugs dang
NK041(di)015:1141: stong pa'i ngang las h'u las mi bskyod par bskyed /
NK041(di)015:1142: de bzhin du shog bu d+h+aihyiga sogs 'og tu bkod pa kho nas kyang ngo //
NK041(di)015:1143: dang yig mkhan h+r+aihls 'od dpag med du bskyed /
NK041(di)015:1144: mchod rten gyi rgyu dang bzo bo las rnam snang du bskyed /
NK041(di)015:1145: de thams cad la snying ga'i sa bon gyis ye shes pa dgug bstim rgyas gdab /
NK041(di)015:1146: dbang bskur nas mchod bstod byas la rigs gsum gyi snying po rten dang mtshungs par bzlas nas /
NK041(di)015:1147: rang gi lce byin gyis badz+ra dzi ha sogs /
NK041(di)015:1151: thugs rje'i bdag nyid can rab gnas //
NK041(di)015:1152: zhes par sku rten thugs rten sogs ci rigs par
NK041(di)015:1153: bsgyur bas snyan gsan phab pas gnang ba byin par
NK041(di)015:1154: bsam la / slar mchod nas yig brgyas brtan par byas /
NK041(di)015:1155: badz+ra muh rgyu dang bzo bo'i ye shes pa gshegs /
NK041(di)015:1157: dam tshig pa zhu ba las de nyid du gyur /
NK041(di)015:1158: de nas bzo bo'i lag gnyis su +aa las /
NK041(di)015:1159: zla ba la gnas pa'i rdo rje rtse lnga pa re re /
NK041(di)015:1160: de zhu ba las rdo rje'i lag pa /
NK041(di)015:1161: sor mo rnams kyang rdo rje rtse gcig pa re rer gyur /
NK041(di)015:1162: slar yang de'i spyi bor 'khor lo /
NK041(di)015:1163: mgrin par pad+ma +aahsnyinga gar rdo rje h+aum gis mtshan
NK041(di)015:1164: par bltas la gnas gsum du rdo rje reg cing
NK041(di)015:1166: shog bu rnams d+h+aihyiga tu gyur pa las byung ba'i
NK041(di)015:1167: 'od zer gyis gsung rdo rje yi ge'i rnam par
NK041(di)015:1168: spyan drangs nas shog bu la thim par bsam /
NK041(di)015:1169: pir dang smyu gu tshon rtsi snag tsha sogs la /
NK041(di)015:1171: zhes 'khor los sgyur ba'i sngags dang las thams cad pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas la /
NK041(di)015:1172: pir sogs shes rab ye shes kyi bdag nyid /
NK041(di)015:1173: tshon dang snag tsha sogs rdo rje'i rdul phra rab
NK041(di)015:1174: yongs su gyur pa'i ye shes kyi bdud rtsir bsam
NK041(di)015:1175: la / d+h+aihsh+ru ti smri ti bi dza ya sarba
NK041(di)015:1176: adz+ny+aa na phata la a sa h+aa ri ni h+r+aihs+w+aa
NK041(di)015:1177: la / h+aa / zhes pas basngagasa pa'i lag cha
NK041(di)015:1178: de rnams la gtad nas yig brgyas brtan par bya'o
NK041(di)015:1180: gang du sku gzugs dang mchod rten sogs rnying zhing zhig ral du gyur pa gso ba dang /
NK041(di)015:1181: yul 'jig pa dang 'khrug pa mu ge sogs mi dge bar 'byung bar bshad de /
NK041(di)015:1182: yul bzang por 'o brgyal ba'i sa la /
NK041(di)015:1183: spo ba dang rgyu dman pa las bzang por bsgrub pa sogs la arga'i cho ga bya yis /
NK041(di)015:1184: rten de rang la mi mkho bar shes pa dang
NK041(di)015:1185: rgyu dang nang bzhugs la rngams pa sogs kyis byas
NK041(di)015:1186: na nye ba'i mtshams med du 'gyur ba yin no
NK041(di)015:1187: // lag len ni rten gyi mdun du mchod gtor rgyas par bsham /
NK041(di)015:1188: bdag gi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas rten la mchod pas mchod /
NK041(di)015:1189: spyi sgos kyi srung ma dang gzhi bdag la gtor ma phul nas bka' bsgo /
NK041(di)015:1190: bdag gis sems can gyi don du bde bar gshegs pa'i rten zhig pa gso ba'am /
NK041(di)015:1192: dman pa las bzang por bgyid pa sogs kyi don
NK041(di)015:1193: du nangs par rab gnas spo bar bya'o snyam du
NK041(di)015:1194: bsam la / 'di zhes bya ba'i bcom ldan 'das //
NK041(di)015:1197: zhes pa spo bar 'tshal du bsgyur ba gsum gyis snyan gsan phab /
NK041(di)015:1198: nangs par rten gyi drung du mchod gtor gsar pa rgya chen po bsham /
NK041(di)015:1199: bdag gi rnal 'byor sngon du 'gro bas rten rnying par mchod cing bstod /
NK041(di)015:1200: sngar bzhin snyan gsan phab nas /
NK041(di)015:1201: de'i mdun du me long g.ya' dag pa bzhag la rten gyi gzugs brnyan 'char du bcug /
NK041(di)015:1202: de nas bdag gi thugs ka nas 'od zer lcags
NK041(di)015:1203: kyu lta bu spros pas rten gyi lha dam tshig
NK041(di)015:1204: pa dang ye shes pa gnyis su med par me
NK041(di)015:1205: long gi gzugs la thim par bsam la /
NK041(di)015:1206: badz+ra sa m+aa dzah dzahmh'u ba hoh zhes dgug gzhug
NK041(di)015:1207: bcing mnyes kyis rten gyi lha me long gi gzugs
NK041(di)015:1208: brnyan dang gnyis med du gyur pa yig brgyas brtan
NK041(di)015:1209: par byas la mchod bstod dang bkra shis gsol te
NK041(di)015:1210: / dar ser pos dril la rgyab phyogs su mdud cing rgyas gdab /
NK041(di)015:1211: dbu zhabs mi log pa'i mtshan ma byas nas mchod gral du bzhugs su gsol te bkur sti bya'o //
NK041(di)015:1212: rten gsar pa grub nas rab gnas dngos gzhi'i rten
NK041(di)015:1213: bskyed kyi rjes su sngar gyi me long de'i mdun
NK041(di)015:1214: du kha phye la rten rnying pa'i dam ye gsar
NK041(di)015:1215: ba'i dam tshig pa la sgo ba bzhi'i sngags rgyas
NK041(di)015:1217: slar ye shes pa spyan 'dren cho ga'i dkyus bzhin no //
NK041(di)015:1218: sngar gyi rten rnying pa rdo'i rigs yin na chu bor spyan 'dren /
NK041(di)015:1219: mi nus na ri mthon por khung bu brkos la gzhug /
NK041(di)015:1220: shing yin na mar gyis brlan pa'i ras kyis dkris la sbyin sreg gi mer bsreg /
NK041(di)015:1221: zangs dang mkhar ba sogs ni rten gsar pa'i rgyur bzhu ba yin na gsar ba'i rgyur bsre /
NK041(di)015:1222: thag ring ba sogs kyis mi nus na chur 'dren
NK041(di)015:1223: pa'am de nyid du mchod rten brtsigs la rab gnas
NK041(di)015:1224: bya / rten 'dre can gyi rgyu ni gsar par
NK041(di)015:1225: mi bsre bar drag po'i sreg blugs kyis sbyang bar
NK041(di)015:1226: bya / bya'o // slob dpon a b+h+aa yas ni /
NK041(di)015:1227: rten rnying pa'i ye shes pa mchod bstod dang chos
NK041(di)015:1228: skyong dang gzhi bdag la gtor ma btang nas rang
NK041(di)015:1229: bzhin gyi gnas su gshegs par bzhed do //
NK041(di)015:1230: de ltar rgyud dang 'brel byed kyi gzhung lugs rnams
NK041(di)015:1231: las ji ltar bshad pa bzhin du rten gsar du
NK041(di)015:1232: bzhengs pa / rnying pa gso ba /
NK041(di)015:1233: de la rab tu gnas pa rnams legs par byas
NK041(di)015:1234: na gnas skabs dang mthar thug gi don phun sum
NK041(di)015:1235: tshogs pa'i dpal thams cad dka' ba med par bde
NK041(di)015:1236: blag tu 'grub par gdon mi za'o //
NK041(di)015:1238: gdod nas mun bral bde chen ye shes ros //
NK041(di)015:1239: brtan g.yo'i dngos kun khyab par rab gnas kyang //
NK041(di)015:1240: 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji bzhin snang brnyan rten //
NK041(di)015:1241: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga 'grel byed gzhung //
NK041(di)015:1242: mkhas mang gsung ngag legs bshad gang+g+aa'i klung /
NK041(di)015:1243: rnam dpyod 'dzin ma'i ltor bskyil rol pa'i mtsho //
NK041(di)015:1244: 'khrul med zab don rin chen 'byung ba'i gnas //
NK041(di)015:1245: 'di ko bka' drin rjes dran mchod pa'i yon //
NK041(di)015:1246: 'khrul med lag len gnad kyi nor bu'i dpyid //
NK041(di)015:1247: don gnyer mchis na re ba 'bras ldan 'gyur //
NK041(di)015:1248: phyogs lhung log par rtog pa 'dis ci bya //
NK041(di)015:1249: de bas rigs mthun gzhung lugs brten pa zab //
NK041(di)015:1250: deng dus gzu bor dpyod min chen po 'ga' //
NK041(di)015:1251: rnam dag gzhung gi lag len gsal byas na //
NK041(di)015:1252: gsar ma'i ring lugs gzung zhes dmod char 'bebs //
NK041(di)015:1253: de phyir 'di brjod 'bras bu gang du 'tshal //
NK041(di)015:1254: 'on te rgyal gsung rgyud dang de 'brel gzhung //
NK041(di)015:1255: tshad mar gyur pa de dag dpang rab gnas rtsa
NK041(di)015:1256: ba'i rgyud galpo'i rab gnas kyi rtogs pa zla gsang
NK041(di)015:1257: 'dus pa'i rgyud rim pa gsum pa rtsa 'grel sogs
NK041(di)015:1259: gzu bo'i blo ldan yod na brtags pas shes //
NK041(di)015:1260: rtog pa med na mu cor ci phyir smra //
NK041(di)015:1261: gang zhig shes bya'i kun gsal khyon dag kyang //
NK041(di)015:1262: lhag bsam chu sgrogs ci dgar chags pa las //
NK041(di)015:1263: ngag tshig chu char phab 'dis nyal 'gro'i dpal //
NK041(di)015:1264: spel mod nongs gyur ci mchis bzod mdzad rigs //
NK041(di)015:1265: de ltar tshig don legs bshad yar ngo'i mthus //
NK041(di)015:1266: mkhas mang dgongs pa'i cha rdzogs thub bstan gyi //
NK041(di)015:1267: zla rgyas dkar po'i 'od snang mtha' yas pas //
NK041(di)015:1268: zung 'jug phan bde'i ku mud bzhad byed shog /
NK041(di)015:1269: sku gsung thugs kyi rten rab tu gnas pa'i cho
NK041(di)015:1270: ga rgyud dang man ngag gi don rab tu gsal
NK041(di)015:1271: bar byed pa'i 'grel byed legs par bshad pa'i rol
NK041(di)015:1273: bdag nyid la mchog tu gus pa'i sri zhu lhur
NK041(di)015:1274: byed pa mchod dpon ngag dbang tshul khrims kyis ring
NK041(di)015:1275: mo nas 'bad pas bskul ba las /
NK041(di)015:1276: kun mkhyen rgyal ba'i dbang po ngag dbang blo bzang rgya mtsho dang /
NK041(di)015:1277: rdo rje 'chang phrin las lhun grub kyi bka' drin
NK041(di)015:1278: las rdo rje theg pa'i chos tshul rab 'byams la
NK041(di)015:1279: mnga' 'byor ba'i sh+aakya'i dge bsnyen rig pa 'dzin pa
NK041(di)015:1280: 'gyur med rdo rjes srin po'i lo dbo nya ba'i
NK041(di)015:1281: yar ngo'i tshes bcu la gangs can gyi sa'i thig
NK041(di)015:1282: le ri bo gru 'dzin gyi pho brang chen por
NK041(di)015:1283: sbyar ba'i yi ge pa ni ngag dbang phrin las
